cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Map__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Map__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_PL_Map__c.description: Contains the mapping information of picklists and dropdown boxes in the mobile application.

cgc_sync__Field__c.description: Salesforce field name of the picklist.

cgc_sync__HasChildren__c.description: Indicates whether thereâ€™s an extension record (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Has_Empty_Item__c.description: Indicates whether the picklist contains an empty item (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Mobile_App_Domain__c.description: Toggle ID of the mobile app domain.

cgc_sync__Object__c.description: Name of the Salesforce object that contains the picklist.
